話.definition: dialect; language; spoken words; speech; talk; words; conversation; what sb said; CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

話不投機半句多.pinyin: hua4 bu4 tou2 ji1 ban4 ju4 duo1
話不投機半句多.definition: (idiom) when views are irreconcilable, it's a waste of breath to continue discussion

話中有刺.definition: one's words carry barbs; one's remarks are sarcastic

話中有話.definition: one's words carry an implicit meaning

話事人.definition: (coll.) (from Cantonese) the boss; the big cheese; the top dog

話別.definition: to say a few parting words; to bid goodbye

話到嘴邊.definition: to be on the verge of saying what is on one's mind

話到嘴邊留三分.pinyin: hua4 dao4 zui3 bian1 liu2 san1 fen1
話到嘴邊留三分.definition: A still tongue makes a wise head. (idiom)

話劇.definition: stage play; modern drama; CL:臺|台[tai2],部[bu4]

話匣子.definition: phonograph or radio (old term); chatterbox; talkative person

話又說回來.definition: (but) then again; (but) on the other hand

話多不甜.definition: too much talk is a nuisance (idiom)

話本.definition: Song and Yuan literary form based on vernacular folk stories

話柄.definition: a pretext for gossip; a matter for derision

話筒.definition: microphone; (telephone) receiver; handset; megaphone; (fig.) mouthpiece; spokesperson

話茬.definition: tone of voice; topic; subject under discussion

話茬兒.definition: erhua variant of 話茬|话茬[hua4 cha2]

話裡套話.definition: to use seemingly innocent conversation topics as a pretext to glean information; to touch upon other matters not central to the topic being discussed

話裡有話.definition: one's words carry an implicit meaning

話語權.definition: ability to have one's say and be listened to; influence; clout

話說.definition: It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative); to discuss; to recount

話說回來.definition: (but) then again; (but) on the other hand

話鋒.definition: topic under discussion; direction or tone of the conversation

話鋒一轉.definition: to change the direction or tone of a conversation

話題.definition: subject (of a talk or conversation); topic
